text: Bess Worapon Tapaopong (Thai: เบส วรพล ตะเภาพงษ์), shortly known as Worapon Tapaopong, (born on September 9, 1996) is a Thai actor, is best known for his role as Korn Anucha in Time a Thai television series.https://www.lavanguardia.com/peliculas-series/personas/bess-worapon- tapaopong-2206778 ==Career== In 2016 he played the role as Chai in Feel Good to say Goodbye and The Waning Moon on 2020.https://blworld.net/cast/bess- worapon-tapaoponghttps://www.thetvdb.com/people/8018108-bess-worapon- tapaopong?sort=popularity&types;=movies ==Filmography== ===Films=== * 2024 – Time as Korn Anucha * 2020 – Waning Moon * 2016 – Feel Good to say Goodbye as Chai ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Thai people Category:Thai actors
title: Worapon Tapaopong
